downloadTitle: eBook: Building a Resilient Organization through Integrated Cloud-based IT
downloadDescription: Explore the impact of Microsoft 365 adoption on productivity, management, and security.
detailsSection: Conducted with 500 IT decision makers responsible for device, productivity, collaboration, and endpoint management tools at their respective organizations, this study explores whether, and to what degree, the adoption of Microsoft 365 leads to improved outcomes in areas like end-user productivity and satisfaction, IT operational efficiency, and business resiliency. The survey was commissioned by Microsoft and conducted by ESG.
systemRequirementsSection: This guide is available in PDF format. To access the file. you will need Microsoft Edge, Reader, Adobe Reader, or a compatible PDF reader.
installInstructionSection: Click the Download button and open the file directly or save it to your local device for future reference.
